  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static SharkNetPKI getInstance()
      Return Instance of PKI
      Returns:

    • init

      public static SharkNetPKI init​(char[] password, java.io.InputStream inputStream) throws SharkNetException
      Initialize PKI with empty Public Keys and Certificates. Need to be done before the PKI can be used. Important, if you never persist the keystore, the input stream has to be null!
      Parameters:
      password - Password for Keystore
      inputStream - stream to load keystore
      Returns:
      Initialized instance PKI
      Throws:
      SharkNetException

    • init

      public static SharkNetPKI init​(char[] keyStorePassword, java.io.InputStream inputStream, java.util.HashSet<SharkNetPublicKey> sharkNetPublicKeys, java.util.HashSet<SharkNetCertificate> sharkNetCertificates) throws SharkNetException
      Initialize PKI with given Public Keys an Certificates. Need to be done before the PKI can be used. Important, if you never persist the keystore, the input stream has to be null!
      Parameters:
      keyStorePassword - Password for Keystore
      sharkNetPublicKeys - List of Public Keys that the PKI should manage
      sharkNetCertificates - List of Certifcates that the PKI should manage
      Returns:
      Initialized instance PKI
      Throws:
      SharkNetException

      Specified by:
